org.jivesoftware.openfire.crowd

Class CrowdAdminProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.openfire.crowd.CrowdAdminProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdminProvider

    public class CrowdAdminProvider
extends Object
implements AdminProvider
    Admin provider which will map a crowd group with openfire authorized admin users

      • isReadOnly

        public boolean isReadOnly()
        Description copied from interface: AdminProvider
        Indicates whether the admin list is read-only or not. In other words, whether an admin can change who is an admin from the Openfire admin interface.
        Specified by:
        isReadOnly in interface AdminProvider
        Returns:
        True or false if the admin list can be edited.
